title: How to Make Bircher Muesli with Pear and Berries

steps.headline: Soak the oats.
steps.description: Mix the rolled oats and barley in a bowl. Pour the pear juice in the bowl and mix well. Leave the bowl alone for the mixture to soak either for one hour or overnight.

steps.headline: Grate the pear.
steps.description: Try to avoid the core as you grate it. Discard the core and place the pear grates into the soaked bowl.

steps.headline: Mix well.
steps.description: Add the yogurt in the bowl and mix everything thoroughly.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Spoon the muesli into a serving bowl. Top the meal off with berries and roasted almonds.

text: Soak the oats. Mix the rolled oats and barley in a bowl. Pour the pear juice in the bowl and mix well. Leave the bowl alone for the mixture to soak either for one hour or overnight. Grate the pear. Try to avoid the core as you grate it. Discard the core and place the pear grates into the soaked bowl. Mix well. Add the yogurt in the bowl and mix everything thoroughly. Serve. Spoon the muesli into a serving bowl. Top the meal off with berries and roasted almonds.
